verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Only be still. Only be still.
God will deliver you.
Only be still. (Repeat)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus is here. Jesus is here.
All things are possible.
Jesus is here. (Repeat)

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
God will not fail. God will not fail.
Only He answers prayer.
God will not fail. (Repeat)
